data: Don Anastasio de Rada | Donna Estephania

Don Anastasio de Rada, a gentleman of Grenada, was living happily in the town of Antequera, with Donna Estephania his wife, who united every charm of person and mind with the most unquestionable virtue.
The Adventures of Gil Blas of Santillane, Volume 3
The Adventures of Gil Blas of Santillane, Volume 3 (of 3)
Le Sage, Alain René, 1668-1747; Smollett, T. (Tobias), 1721-1771 [Translator]
